title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Cooperating Association and Bookstore        The museum bookstore is located at Second and Broadway across the street from the park visitor center. NPS photo/S. Muether   Â      Alaska Geographic Association  Books and other educational materials are available for sale in the park bookstore or you may shop online through the Alaska Geographic Association.   In Skagway the bookstore is located on Broadway near Second Avenue.  It is across the street from the National Park visitor center.     During the summer hours are 8:30 am-5:30pm daily.
